top_comments_top.body: Barotrauma IS fun. It's also punishing.
*Subnautica lurking in the darkness*: I wonder if I should say something?

Ah, Barotrauma. Such fun.

I remember doing a diving excursion in some ruined temple. Accidently put a fuel-tank on, instead of a scuba-tank.

Died shortly after.
